These are my packages

```{r setup}
library(haven)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```

This is how i import data

```{r}

airline <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/airline.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)
```

Data prep dplyr

```{r}

airline2 <- airline %>%
 filter(YEAR >= 1951L & YEAR <= 1979L) %>%
 filter(Y >= 4.4 & Y <= 23.8) %>%
 filter(W >= 0.44 & 
 W <= 1.78) %>%
 filter(R >= 0.195 & R <= 0.59) %>%
 filter(L >= 2.05 & L <= 6.9) %>%
 filter(K >= 1.8 & 
 K <= 9.6)

```


My data Viz
```{r}
p <- ggplot(airline2) +
  aes(x = YEAR, y = Y) +
  geom_point(shape = "circle", size = 1.5, colour = "#112446") +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(p)

```
